title: Login Functionality Test
description: This test verifies that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials.
preconditions: User must be registered and have valid login credentials.

steps.expectedResult: User is redirected to the dashboard

expectedResult: User successfully logs in and is redirected to the dashboard.

title: Password Reset Functionality Test
description: This test verifies that a user can successfully reset their password using the 'Forgot Password' feature.
preconditions: User must have an active account with a valid email address.

steps.action: Enter a registered email address and click 'Submit'
steps.expectedResult: A success message appears, stating a password reset link has been sent

steps.action: Check email and click the password reset link
steps.expectedResult: Password reset page is opened in the browser

steps.action: Enter a new password and confirm it, then click 'Submit'
steps.expectedResult: Password is successfully reset and a confirmation message is displayed

expectedResult: User successfully resets their password and is able to log in with the new password.

title: Add Item to Cart Functionality Test
description: This test verifies that a user can successfully add an item to their shopping cart from the product details page.
preconditions: User must have access to the e-commerce platform and at least one product must be available for purchase.

steps.action: Navigate to the product listing page
Select a product and open the product details page

steps.expectedResult: The item is added to the shopping cart, and a confirmation message is displayed
The selected item is visible in the cart

expectedResult: The user successfully adds an item to their cart, and it appears correctly in the shopping cart.

title: Search Functionality Test
description: This test verifies that a user can search for products using the search bar and retrieve relevant results.
preconditions: User must have access to the e-commerce platform with products available in the catalog.

steps.action: Enter a product name into the search bar (e.g., 'Laptop')
steps.expectedResult: The product name is entered in the search bar
The search results page is displayed

steps.action: Verify that relevant products are displayed in the results
steps.expectedResult: Search results display relevant products related to the query

expectedResult: The user is able to search for products and see relevant results based on their query.
